name: Junior Mystery Quest
description:
Nintendo.com Description (from Ad Blurbs)

With its unique visual style and captivating characters, Junior Mystery Quest for Nintendo DS will keep kids searching for more clues at every corner!



It is the first hidden object game developed exclusively for children. Featuring hours of fun gameplay, Junior Mystery Quest takes you along a strange and exciting adventure where it is up you to solve the mystery of the Tibutton family and their missing Uncle Albert. Uncover peculiar and challenging puzzles on your quest and discover just how fascinating the life of a detective can be!

Features

• Meet interesting characters and reveal their true identities;• Unique visual style creates mystery and intrigue;• Fascinating settings are both fun and freaky;• Thrilling and amusing investigation designed for kids;• Hours of fun gameplay;• Loads of hidden objects and puzzles to uncover.
